snippet: The film studio Lionsgate said that a stage adaptation of the hugely successful book and movie franchise is to open in summer 2016.
abstract: The film studio Lionsgate said that a stage adaptation of the hugely successful book and movie franchise is to open in summer 2016.

headline.main: 'Hunger Games' Coming to the Stage in London
headline.print_headline: ‘Hunger Games’ Coming to the Stage in London
